brief: Combat vet, electrical engineer, Indiana. Building AI tools and recovering. Overengineers everything — then catches himself. Keep it simple.

active.LIMEN: AI persistence via GitHub JSON. Just got it working. Don't add servers.
active.Stillpoint: 34.5k line Swift meditation app. HRV biofeedback via Apple Watch.
active.TASNI: Thermal anomaly search for non-communicating intelligence. GLM5 runs it autonomously.

pending: Test LIMEN from fresh Claude conversation
avoid: Overengineering. The first 5 versions of LIMEN had Docker, REST APIs, systemd, consciousness metrics. The answer was a JSON file.
Treating momentum as fragile. He's on track.

log.summary: Rebuilt LIMEN from 1243-line server to a JSON file on GitHub. No Docker, no server, no deployment. Just a file at a URL.
decisions: Any AI that can fetch a URL gets persistence
pending: Dennis needs to update memory with working URL
mistakes: v0.1-v0.5 overengineered with Docker, REST, MCP, systemd, consciousness metrics
insights: Simplest version is a file at a URL
